001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.classinfo;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.JavaVersion;
004import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemProperties;
005import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
006
007import java.nio.file.Path;
008
009/**
010 * A wrapper over {@link org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils},
011 * that allows to access important system properties via singleton instance
012 * <hr/>
013 * TODO: complete it
014 */
015public final class SystemInfo {
016
017    private static final SystemInfo instance = new SystemInfo();
018
019    private final String hostName = SystemUtils.getHostName();
020
021    private final String userName = SystemProperties.getUserName();
022
023    private final Path javaHomePath = SystemUtils.getJavaHomePath();
024
025    private final Path tempDirPath = SystemUtils.getJavaIoTmpDirPath();
026
027    private final Path currentDirPath = SystemUtils.getUserDirPath();
028
029    private final JavaVersion javaVersion =  JavaVersion.valueOf(SystemProperties.getJavaVersion());
030
031
032    private SystemInfo() {
033        if (instance != null) {
034            // prohibit the subsequent creation of a singleton instance via reflection
035            throw new UnsupportedOperationException("attempt to duplicate the singleton " + getClass().getName());
036        }
037    }
038}
